circumstances: Patrick Kaur, who has gone missing before, disappeared from a park on Crow Road, Glasgow. He was last seen near the library on Belsyde Avenue. Known for occasionally mistaking routes, Patrick was later traced by police to 85 Bassett Avenue, Glasgow, G13 3JP, showing signs of disorientation. Given his high-risk status and age, family and authorities have been urged to monitor his movements closely to prevent future incidents.
